text: If at any time the District of Columbia or the national government shall acquire, by purchase, condemnation proceedings, or otherwise, the property of any telegraph company in the District of Columbia, nothing shall then be paid for the rights accorded under §§ 34-1921.01 to 34-1921.07, inclusive, to build and lay such conduits.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 43-1417.

DC CODE § 34-1921.08

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Rights to build and lay conduits not compensable in event of condemnation.
